autocompound_cooldown_seconds.description: Seconds to wait before autocompound is incentivized.

autocompound_rewards_config.description: Configuration of rewards to the address who helped to execute autocompound

create_position.description: Create position with instantiation. Will not create position if omitted

pool_id.description: Id of the pool used to get rewards

AssetEntry.description: An unchecked ANS asset entry. This is a string that is formatted as `src_chain>[intermediate_chain>]asset_name`

AutocompoundRewardsConfig.description: Configuration on how rewards should be distributed to the address who helped to execute autocompound

max_gas_balance.description: Upper bound of gas tokens expected after the swap

min_gas_balance.description: If gas token balance falls below this bound a swap will be generated

swap_asset.description: Denominator of the asset that will be used for swap to the gas asset

asset0.description: The two next fields indicate the token0/token1 ratio we want to deposit inside the current ticks

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

Uint64.description:
A thin wrapper around u64 that is using strings for JSON encoding/decoding, such that the full u64 range can be used for clients that convert JSON numbers to floats, like JavaScript and jq.

# Examples

Use `from` to create instances of this and `u64` to get the value out:

``` # use cosmwasm_std::Uint64; let a = Uint64::from(42u64); assert_eq!(a.u64(), 42);

let b = Uint64::from(70u32); assert_eq!(b.u64(), 70); ```
